text: Iwoameneamatsatira Mtumwi kapena Mneneri amene sadziwa kulemba ndi kuwerenga, amene mbiri yake inalembedwa mâ€™Buku la chipangano chakale ndi mu chipangano chatsopano. Iye amawalamulira kuchita zabwino ndipo amawaletsa kuchita zoipa. Ndipo amawaloleza zabwino ndi kuwaletsa zonyansa. Iye amawapeputsira katundu wolemera amene adali pa iwo. Motero iwo amene akhulupirira mwa iye ndi kumulemekeza, ndi kumuthandiza iye ndi kutsata kuunika kumene kwatumizidwa ndi iye, ndi okhawo amene adzakhala opambana
